string.value: The Sacred Barrier of the Forest
After hearing about the red trees, \n#b#p2081000##k didn't think it was unusal. He wanted to hear #p1032001#, the grand magician of #m101000000#'s opinion and asked me to see #b#p1032001##k.
Since #p2081000# wanted #p1032001#'s adivce on the red trees, I went to go see #p1032001# in #m101000003# #m101000000# to ask him.
What would you like to tell me? \r\n#L0# #bAccording to Yaku, a tree at the path to the Dragon Forest has turned crimson red. Are you aware of this?#k

Yes ... I actually saw it myself a while ago. Minar Forest consists of an endless sea of green trees, and for it to feature a red tree ... the reason the forest featured all those green trees was because the forest has been protected by the great power of a dragon called Nine Spirit, creating a force field that protected the forest from harm.\r\n#L0# #bWhat kind of a dragon is Nine Spirit?#k

Nine Spirit is the leader of all the dragons that reside in Minar Forest. It is also the looming presence that serves to protect this forest. We the Hafrings are responsible for nurturing its eggs until its birth, and it protects us in return. This is the reason why when the tree turned red, we cannot ignore this matter. Say, if you are not that busy, can you do me a favor?
At #b#m101000000##k of Victoria Island, you'll find #b#p1032001##k, who is the head wizard. Please hand him this letter I wrote. He'll be the one person that may know why the tree turned red.
You must be really busy right now. If so, then please stop by when you have time.
How can I help you? \r\n#L0# #bI have brought a letter written by Chief Tatamo#k
Oh really? Please hand it to me.
Hmmm ... So this is what's going on at Minar Forest. Let's see ... there should be an ancient document that deals with this. Give me a minute.
I'd like you to visit #b#p1032001##k, who's in #m101000003# of #b#m101000000##k, and hand him this letter.
Did you lose the letter I gave you? Hmmm ... hold on a minute. I'll write you another one.
